comments.body: Note that I didn't document `acknowledgeMode`. This is because I read various threads on Jms  stating that this setting is not considered when producing records.

comments.body: "producer" is kafka terminology and I don't think it means anything in general for people using JMS. What about something along the lines of "Sending messages to a queue can also be done in a flow where the elements are passed downstream after they have been persisted allowing for further processing"
